title: Receiving Honours Post game
body: Just sent an honour to a friend to see how it worked on the new client, asked them to send one back and still haven't received a notification yet that I had been honoured. Has anyone else experienced this? Or tested it?

replies.body: Ill go run a check on this if not report it as a bug thats what we are testing for bugs and glitches
yea i gave it a test by the looks of it there is no notification at the moment lol rip
Honours doesn't seem to be giving a notification for me either
